Package com.lelanor.projects.codebreakers.evaluators

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Evaluator
    public class Codex
extends java.lang.Object
implements Evaluator
    This class manage the automatic evaluation of the Codex game according to the contract established with the Evaluator interface

      • analyse

        public Result analyse​(Combination guess,
                      Combination goal)
        this method analyse a Combination Guess vs a Combination Goal. It is used by the CodeMaker player
        Specified by:
        analyse in interface Evaluator
        Parameters:
        guess - the Combination to analyse
        goal - the Combination to compare with
        Returns:
        a Result expressed according to the GameType
        See Also:
        GameType

      • analyse

        public Result analyse​(Result result,
                      Combination goal,
                      CombinationLists lists)
        this method analyse a Result comparing it to a Combination Goal and use the CombinationList to find the result within
        Specified by:
        analyse in interface Evaluator
        Parameters:
        result - the Result to analyse
        goal - the Combination to compare with
        lists - the list of all possible Combination according to the range et the combination size
        Returns:
        a Result that is the next code to be tried to guess
